If you are just picking this game up. You might wanna just save yourself the headache and put it back down unless you are a glutton for punishment lucky for the tf2 community I am. The average TF2 lifer has over 2k hours of their life spent playing this and boy are they diehard religious about this game. You could say they have overachieved mastering this game to the point even bots can't slow them down.
I read reviews of these people forming their lives around this game. Meeting their future crotch goblin dispensers because of this game. Raising their lil psychopaths on this game. Basically you get a life story out of it. We get it. You were privileged enough to sit on your ass that long. Congratulations. 
By the way this game is pretty fun if you can get past the constant torture of people who play this too much.
An old friend... been playing this since I got my first pc. Always a fun time!
